actions.Multiattack: The behir makes two attacks: one with its bite and one to constrict.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d8 + 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage.
actions.Lightning Breath (Recharge 5xe2x80x936): The behir exhales a line of lightning that is 20 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 14+1d8 + 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 66 (12d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
